wikipedia_page.main: John Anthony "Tony" Read (born 5 July 1942 in Haydock, Lancashire) is an English former footballer, most noted as a player for Luton Town.

response: *Tony Read Luton Footballer, ran the Old Bell Inn until 1983

Rogério Ceni has scored the most goals for a goalkeeper, having recorded 131 goals through free kicks and penalties across his 23-year career. Tony Read and José Luis Chilavert are the only goalkeepers to score a hat-trick (three goals in a game), with all three goals coming from penalty kicks.

link_mentions.page: List of Luton Town F.C. players
response: :D.  Tony Read was unusually utilised as both a goalkeeper and as a forward – he is listed here as a goalkeeper as he appeared more often in that position.
